title: Caribbean Drone Photo & Video Project
tagline: Cinematic storytelling that elevated brand perception

hero.alt: Aerial drone shot of completed pool

context.problem: Marketing relied on inconsistent job-site photos taken by staff, lacking emotional impact and visual consistency. No aspirational visual narrative.
constraints: Active construction sites with safety concerns
FAA regulations for commercial drone use
context.quote: Show the craftsmanship. Show the experience. Show what's possible.

solution.approach: Developed comprehensive drone media initiative using DJI and custom FPV drones to capture cinematic aerial footage and photography, creating a reusable media library for all marketing channels.
bullets: Captured cinematic drone and FPV footage at project sites
Built repeatable workflow for scouting, flight planning, and editing
Applied branded overlays and LUT color grading
Created searchable media library for marketing and sales
Integrated content into web, social, and digital ads

process.title: Pre-Production
process.description: Site scouting, flight planning, and safety review

process.title: Editing
process.description: Color grading, branded overlays, and audio mixing

process.title: Distribution
process.description: Optimize for web, social, and sales materials

reflection.learning: Aspirational visuals don't just show a product—they tell a story. Invest in emotion, not just documentation.
